panels.description:
interface oper status and admin status.   
Select a device and interfaces

targets.query: SELECT count("/interfaces/interface/state/oper-status") FROM /interfaces/ WHERE ("device" = '100.123.1.0' AND "/interfaces/interface/@name" = 'ge-0/0/0' AND "/interfaces/interface/state/oper-status" = 'UP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT count("/interfaces/interface/state/oper-status") FROM /interfaces/ WHERE ("device" = '100.123.1.0' AND "/interfaces/interface/@name" = 'ge-0/0/0' AND "/interfaces/interface/state/oper-status" = 'UP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT count("/interfaces/interface/state/oper-status") FROM /interfaces/ WHERE ("device" = '100.123.1.0' AND "/interfaces/interface/@name" = 'ge-0/0/0' AND "/interfaces/interface/state/oper-status" = 'UP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
